text: 【Quark】 Privacy Policy
Effective date: [2022] Year [8] month [24] Day
Update date: [2022] Year [9] month [1] Day
【introduction】
You are welcome to use our products and services!

We know the importance of personal information to you. Your trust is very important to us. We will strictly abide by laws and regulations to take corresponding security protection measures to protect your personal information security and controlling.

Based on this, the [Quark] service provider (or "we") formulates this "[Quark] Privacy Policy" (hereinafter referred to as "this policy"/"privacy policy"), helping you fully understand the use of our products and our products and our products and our products and andDuring the service, how will we collect, use, share, store, and protect your personal information, as well as how you can manage your personal information so that you can make a better choice.

Before you start using our products and services, please read and understand this policy carefully. In particular, we should focus on reading the clauses we logging in the threatening of the body/coarse body to ensure that you fully understand and agree to use it before starting to use.
The professional vocabulary involved in this policy, we try to explain to you in a concise and popular expression in order to facilitate your understanding.
If you have any questions, opinions or suggestions on the content of this policy, you can contact us through the contact information at the end of this policy.

You agree that the privacy policy said that you have understood the functions provided by the application, and the necessary personal information required for functional operation, and give corresponding collection and use authorization, but it does not mean that you have agreed to open up additional functions and handle non -necessary personal information.The opening, processing non -necessary personal information and processing sensitive personal information, we will solicit your consent separately according to your actual usage.
label: Cessation of Operations
First Party Collection Information
Policy Change

text: This privacy policy will help you understand the following:
1. Scope of application
2. Information collection and use
3. Provide information to the outside world
Fourth, your rights
5. Storage of information
6. Policy update
7. Protection of minors
Eight, contact us
Appendix: Related Definition
1. Scope of application
This policy is applicable to the products and services provided by you with a website, APP client, and new forms that emerge with technology development.

We and affiliated companies have privacy policies on their products or services (such as: "Book Banner Privacy Policy" and "Helping Privacy Policy"), and the corresponding privacy policy is applicable to the corresponding products or services.

In addition to the relevant information collection and use activities described in this policy, this policy is not applicable to other services you provided by the collaborators and other third directions, and other services apply to the personal information collection and use rules that they explain to you.
For example, when you read comics, you can use its special "Quick Watching Privacy Agreement" by Kuai World (Beijing) Technology Co., Ltd..
2. Information collection and use
When you use our products/services, the personal information we need/may need to collect and use includes the following:
1. In order to realize the basic functions of providing you with our products and/or services, you must authorize us to collect and use the necessary information.
If you refuse to provide the corresponding information, you will not be able to use our products and/or services normally;
2. In order to provide you with additional functions to our products and/or services, you can choose to agree or disagree with the information we collected and used alone.

If you refuse to provide it, you will not be able to use related additional functions normally or cannot achieve the functional effects we intend to achieve, which will not affect your basic functions.
We are here to remind you that we are committed to creating a variety of products and services to meet your needs.

Because there are many types and services we provide to you, and there are differences in the scope of the specific product/service selected by different users, the basic/additional functions and the personal information types and scope of personal information and use will be different. Please use specific ones.Product/service function shall prevail.
The specific feature scenarios we will provide you include::
(1) Help you become our member and account management
1. Basic member service
We provide you with services based on the quark account.
In order to create a quark account, you need to provide us at least your mobile phone number.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: To create a quark account, you need to provide your mobile phone number.

text: If you refuse to provide the above information, you will not be able to register for the quark account, you can only use browsing and search services.
label: First Party Collection Information

text: In order to ensure that we are providing services for you, we may verify your identity according to the above information you provide.

If there is a scene that needs to determine your necessary identity (including protecting the rights and interests of minors in accordance with the law, cracking down on telecommunications network fraud, deducting taxes and fees for you, relevant subjects in administrative law enforcement or judicial litigation), you can authorize usThe company obtains your necessary authentication information for your Alipay account for the above purposes.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: If there is a scene that needs to determine your necessary identity according to law, you can authorize us to obtain the necessary authentication information of your corresponding Alipay account from Alipay.

text: 2. Third party authorization Login
You can also log in to Quark through third -party accounts (including Taobao, Alipay, Weibo, WeChat, QQ).

In order to achieve the previous description, you understand and agree that we will obtain and collect your third -party account information from a third party, such as nicknames, avatars, and other information that you agree with the authorization interface.

First Party Collection Information

When you use the functions or services that you can provide to provide, such as network disk, mini -game, photography questions, or live broadcast services, event reward tax deduction services provided by third parties embedded in SDK forms, in accordance with relevant laws and regulations, according to relevant laws and regulations, according to relevant laws and regulations, andYou may need to provide your name, ID number, phone number to prove your true identity.

text: You can refuse to provide it, but you may not be able to obtain related services, but do not affect the normal use of other functions and services.

text: 4. Additional member service
You can choose to further improve your account information, such as providing us your avatars, nicknames, mobile phone numbers, constellations to get additional services that meet your needs.

If you provide a real and effective mobile phone number, Taobao account, and Alipay account for binding, when you encounter accounts such as registered account loss, you can more conveniently find the account.

You can also choose not to bind, you will not be able to use the above -mentioned related services, but do not affect the normal use of other functions and services.
You can manage the binding relationship through "my-account and security".

text: (8) Provide you with security guarantee

label: Important
rewrite: We may not reply to the issue that has nothing to do with this policy or your personal information rights.

text: If you are not satisfied with our reply, especially if you think our personal information processing behavior has harm your legitimate rights and interests, you can also seek solutions by filed a lawsuit to a court with jurisdiction in the place of residence in the defendant.
Appendix: Related Definition
Quick: Refers to the website of Quick (domain name is quark.cn) and Quickbao client.
Quark service provider: refers to Quick's Internet information and software technology service providers Guangzhou Morality Computer Technology Co., Ltd..
Related company: Refers to the related companies of the quark platform service provider disclosed by Alibaba Group Holding Limited (Alibaba Group Holding Limited).
Alipay: Refers to the main Alipay (China) Network Technology Co., Ltd. providing Alipay services.
Personal information: Various information related to recognized or recognized natural persons recorded in electronics or other ways, excluding information after anonymous processing.

Sensitive personal information: Once sensitive personal information is leaked or illegally, it is easy to lead to personal information that is harmful to natural person's personality dignity or personality and property security.Track information, and personal information of minors under the age of 14.
Child: Refers to minors under the age of 14.

Equipment information: Including device identifiers (IMEI, IDFA, Android ID, Mac, OAID, IMSI and other device -related information), application information (application crash information, notification switch status, application installation list, and other application related information), equipment parameters), equipment parametersAnd system information (device type, device model, operating system and hardware -related information), device network environment information (IP address, WIFI information, base station information and other network -related information).
The actual collection of the product shall prevail.

Service log information: When you use the products or services we provide, we will automatically collect and record your detailed usage situation, as a service log, including browsing records, click to view records, search query records, collectors records, purchase services, purchase services, purchase services, and purchase services.Trading and after -sales, follow, comment and share information, publish information, collapse logs, performance logs, and IP addresses, browser types, telecommunications operators, use language, access date and time.
Decoration: Refers to the process of personal information processing, so that it cannot recognize specific natural persons without using additional information.
Anonymous: Refers to the process that personal information cannot identify specific natural persons and cannot recover.
<the-end-of-privacy-policy>
